org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remote

Interface RemotePluginClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Plugin
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ObservableRemotePluginClient

    public interface RemotePluginClient
extends org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Plugin
    API of the Remote Plugin Client associated to the Local Service Server.

    This plugin must be used when you do not intend to observe remotely the plugin events.

    It must be registered by the application installed on a Client not having local access to the smart card reader and that wishes to control the reader remotely :

    • To register the plugin, use the method SmartCardService.registerPlugin(PluginFactory) using the factory {link RemotePluginClientFactory} and do not activate the plugin observation.
    • To access the plugin, use the utility method {link RemotePluginClientUtils#getRemotePlugin()}.
    • To unregister the plugin, use the method SmartCardService.unregisterPlugin(String) using the plugin name.

    This plugin behaves like a Plugin.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Plugin

        getName, getReader, getReaderNames, getReaders
